news.title: Jim Legxacy Announces Release Date for Long-Teased Black British Music (2025) Mixtape
news.summary: The British musician’s first project for XL Recordings lands on July 18

news.title: Shame Announce 2026 Tour, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: “Quiet Life” is the second single from the English band’s Cutthroat

news.title: Blood Orange Announces Fall 2025 Tour Dates
news.summary: The newly announced shows surround Devonté Hynes’ performance at Pitchfork Music Festival Paris

news.title: The Rapture Announce North American and European Tour
news.summary: Beginning in September, Luke Jenner will return to the stage for the first time in years

news.title: China Walker, Half of Ebullient Rap Duo Cam & China, Dies at 32
news.summary: The California musician had been living with a rare and aggressive form of ovarian cancer

news.title: Geese Announce New Album Getting Killed, Share Video for New Song “Taxes”: Watch
news.summary: The New York band, fronted by Cameron Winter, recorded the 3D Country follow-up with producer Kenny Beats

news.title: Hot Chip Announce Greatest-Hits Album, Share Video for New Song “Devotion”: Watch
news.summary: Joy in Repetition has songs from the British dance-pop group’s first seven studio albums

news.title: Neko Case Announces First Album in Seven Years, Shares New Song “Wreck”: Listen
news.summary: Neon Grey Midnight Green is the venerable singer-songwriter’s follow-up to 2018’s Hell-On

news.title: Fever Ray Announces Live Album, Shares New Video for “Now’s the Only Time I Know (Therapy Session)”: Watch
news.summary: The Year of the Radical Romantics was recorded during Karin Dreijer’s tour in support of Radical Romantics

news.title: Danny L Harle Teams Up With PinkPantheress for New Song “Starlight”: Listen
news.summary: The British producer’s first release as lead artist since 2021’s Harlecore—and first single for new label home XL Recordings
